item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North at NM-599 Interchange
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North at NM-599 interchange. Use NM-599 South for the Santa Fe Relief Route. The Sante Fe Relief Route connects the north side of Santa Fe to I-25 south without having to go through downtown Santa Fe.

item.title: NM-14 North at NM-599
item.description: NM-14 north at NM-599. Use NM-599 for I-25. Northbound I-25 traffic can continue north on NM-14, although NM-599 is a shortcut to the freeway. This is the southern end of the Santa Fe Relief Route.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 276
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 276 - NM-599/Santa Fe Relief Route. NM-599 is the truck route around the north side of Santa Fe.

item.title: End NM-599 East at US-84/US-285
item.description: End NM-599 (Santa Fe Relief Route) east at US-84/US-285. Use US-84/US-285 north for Espa単ola. Use US-84/US-285 south for Santa Fe.

item.title: End NM-599 East at US-84/US-285
item.description: End NM-599 (Santa Fe Relief Route) east at US-84/US-285. Use US-84/US-285 north for Espa単ola; use US-84/US-285 south for Santa Fe.

item.title: NM-599 East at Ridgetop Road
item.description: NM-599 East (Santa Fe Relief Route) at Ridgetop Road interchange.

item.title: NM-599 East at Camino La Tierra
item.description: NM-599 east at Camino La Tierra/Calle Nopal interchange. Also use this exit for Las Campanas.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 276
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 276 - NM-599/Madrid/Los Alamos/Espa単ola. NM-599 is the truck route around Santa Fe. I-25 continues north to Las Vegas.

item.title: I-25 North Approaching Exit 276
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 276 (NM-599). Use Exit 276 for Los Alamos, Espa単ola, Madrid. NM-599 is the truck route around Santa Fe.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 276
item.description: I-25 North at Exit 276 - NM-599/Santa Fe Relief Route. NM-599 is the truck route around Santa Fe.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Exit 166
item.description: US-285 South/US-84 East at Exit 166 - NM-599 South/Santa Fe Relief Route. After this interchange, the US-84/US-285 South freeway ends and becomes St. Francis Drive, in Santa Fe.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South Approaching Exit 166
item.description: US-84/US-285 South approaching Exit 166 - NM-599/Santa Fe Relief Route.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South Approaching NM-599
item.description: US-84/US-285 South approaching NM-599 (Santa Fe Relief Route). All trucks bound for I-25 use NM-599.
